utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey! Babe! Aren’t you excited we’re going on our honeymoon?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah I am!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Bermuda, Bahama, come on pretty mama…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That’s right. Get it out of your system while we’re alone.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah! Have a great honeymoon!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I’d better go pack.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh no, I already packed. The only thing I couldn’t find though was your Speedo.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: A Speedo? Uh, I don’t have a Speedo. I’m gonna go pack my regular long bathing suit.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh good you’re still here!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I want to tell you to have a good honeymoon!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: And I also wanted you guys to know that I am telling the father today. What? What? What?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: We know its Ross!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: How?! How do you know?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: It was his sweater, but—Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, I so wanted Ross to know first, but I’m so relieved you guys know.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: This is so great! And I’m gonna be your baby’s aunt!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I know!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Me too!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I’m gonna be an uncle! Come here!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You’re all gonna be aunts and uncles.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, but I’m the only one related by blood.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. Great! So now that you guys all know you can help me. Give me some advice on how I’m gonna tell Ross!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, what were you gonna say?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well I was gonna tell him that I’m-I’m gonna have the baby and he can be as involved as he wants.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well that, that sounds good.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah but how do I start? I mean, what’s-what’s the first thing that I say? Okay great! Thanks.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey! Good luck!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, bye.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Bye.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey, what was that all about?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well I guess there is no harm in telling you now, Rachel and Ross are gonna have a baby.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?! I didn’t even know that—Why didn’t you tell me?! Why am I talking like this?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I didn’t think you could keep it a secret.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?! I am an excellent secret keeper. I have kept all of our secrets.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What secrets?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh no-no Joey, I am not going to tell you because I am an excellent secret keeper.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You’ll tell me later?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You already know.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, it's so romantic to send people off on their honeymoon.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Y’know, Monica and Chandler are married. Ross and Rachel are having a baby. Maybe you and I should do something.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: All in good time my love. All in good time. Oh shoot! I left my guitar in their apartment. Well you can let me in later.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don’t have a key, they took mine to give to you.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What?! They took mine to give to you!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Why would they take away our keys?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Maybe they don’t trust us.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No that’s not it. They let me keep my key the last time they were out of town.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You mean the time you broke the ketchup bottle and cleaned it up with Monica’s guest towels?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, I washed those!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No you didn’t.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah that didn’t sound like me.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, what am I gonna do? I really need my guitar!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, I have stuff in there too.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What stuff?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Monica’s chicken parm! I’ll take care of it. Hey Mr. Treeger, it’s Joey Tribbiani. Listen, I need to get into Monica and Chandler’s apartment. It’s an emergency. Uhh, gas leak! Yeah oh, and bring garlic bread.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Did Rachel find you?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No why?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh she was looking for you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh well, I guess I’ll catch up with her later.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, she really wanted to talk to you now.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, it seemed pretty important.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh no.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I think I might know what this is about.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah. Uh, uh we promised we weren’t gonna tell anybody this but uh, about a month ago Rachel and I slept together.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: And?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wow! I thought you would be a little more shocked.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh sorry. And?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, we-we said we’d just do it that one time but, but now I think she may wanna start things up again.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, I don’t think that’s what it is.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Why? What-what else could it be?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh wow, I don’t feel well.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I’m telling you. I’m telling you. That’s what it is. No wonder she was looking at me all funny during the wedding. She didn’t say anything to you?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Maybe it’s something you ate?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Please, just-just, just go and talk to Rachel.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, I guess I should. Man, y’know what I have to realize? Maybe I’m just not the type of guy women can have just one night with. Y’know, they-they always seem to want a little bit more. I should remember that.

utterance.speaker: Ticket Agent
utterance.content: Next?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: They’re kissing let’s just go around them.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh honey, leave them alone, they’re in love.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I’m in love too! But in an orderly fashion.

utterance.speaker: Ticket Agent
utterance.content: Next?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi! Can you do that and walk? ‘Cause she said, "Next."

utterance.speaker: Woman
utterance.content: Sorry. We didn’t hear you; we’re on our honeymoon.

utterance.speaker: Ticket Agent
utterance.content: Oh, let me see what I can do. There are some first class seats available.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Did you hear that?! They bumped them up to first class because they are on their honeymoon! Come on! Let’s act like we’re on our honeymoon.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: We are on our honeymoon.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Grab my ass!

utterance.speaker: Ticket Agent
utterance.content: Next?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi, sorry. I almost didn’t hear you, because y’know I’m just so in love with my new husband. We’re on our honeymoon.

utterance.speaker: Ticket Agent
utterance.content: Congratulations. Okay, Mr. Bing you’ll be in 25J and Mrs. Bing you’ll be in 25K.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh no, you see we’re on our honeymoon. So umm, can you do your little thing and bump us up to first class?

utterance.speaker: Ticket Agent
utterance.content: I’m sorry, all our first class seats are taken. That couple got the last two.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You see, if we’d gone around them like I said, we—She would’ve given us those tickets. Damnit!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: 25J and K, any chance those aren’t together?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I still can’t believe they took away my key. You trust me with yours.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Of course I do! And I’m gonna give it back to you as soon as they’re done with it at the key shining place.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What the hell is that?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Whoa! Whoa! Whoa! Treeger, what are you doing?

utterance.speaker: Mr. Treeger
utterance.content: You said there was a gas leak in here.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well why don’t you use your key?

utterance.speaker: Mr. Treeger
utterance.content: Because by the time I find it on this thing , the whole place might have exploded. If that happens at another building that I manage, people are gonna start asking questions. Come on! Hurry up.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh! We could have done that.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Look at that! Look at that! They’re going into the first class lounge! Do you know what they have in there?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Me neither! We have to get in!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Just act like you belong.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God! Oranges!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Shh! Nice to see you again.

utterance.speaker: Airline Employee
utterance.content: Uh sir, may I see your tickets please?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes, of course.

utterance.speaker: Airline Employee
utterance.content: I’m sorry, would you move your thumb? I can’t see the seat number.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh that’s all right, I have it memorized. It’s 1A.

utterance.speaker: Airline Employee
utterance.content: Sir, this is not a first class ticket. I’m sorry.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Apology accepted. Excuse us.

utterance.speaker: Airline Employee
utterance.content: Sir! I’m afraid I’m gonna have to ask you to leave.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Fine. Go! Go! Go!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi. Umm, I think there’s something that we really need to talk about.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I think we do. Why don’t we go inside? Look uh, I know why you’re here.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You do?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, and to save you from any embarrassment umm, I think maybe I should talk first.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay. Uh, Ross and Rachel. Rachel and Ross. That’s been one heck of a see-saw hasn’t it?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I mean look, that-that one night we had was fun and…and certainly passionate, but don’t you think it’s better if we just stayed friends?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Seriously. What?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay. Okay. Y’know what? If you want to, we can do it one more time. I mean I’d-I’d be okay with that. In fact, I have some time right now.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, y’know what? Can I, can I talk now?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh sure.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’m pregnant. Ross? Ross? Okay, whenever you’re ready. And you’re the father by the way—but you got that…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Can I get you some water?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I’m good. I’m good.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross, there is no pressure on you. Okay? I mean you can as involved as you want.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, I need uh… I’m just—I don’t know—I don’t understand, umm, how this happened? We-we used a condom.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I know. I know, but y’know condoms only work like 97% of the time.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What? What? What?!! Well they should put that on the box!!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: They do!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No they don’t!!! Well they should put it in huge black letters!!!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay Ross come on let’s just forget about the condoms.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh well I may as well have!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Listen, y’know what? I was really freaked out too when I found out…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Freaked out? Hey no, I’m not freaked out! I’m indignant! As a consumer!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Y’know what? Let’s, let’s talk later.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No! No! I want to talk now! Okay? I—In fact, I am going to talk to the president of the condom company!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, y’know maybe I should come back…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Shh! Shh! Shh!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah I’ll press 1!

utterance.speaker: Mr. Treeger
utterance.content: I’ve looked everywhere. There’s no gas leak.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Huh. So then I can heat this up?

utterance.speaker: Mr. Treeger
utterance.content: Anyway uh, I’ll get moving on that new door.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh great! And listen, could you do us a favor and not tell Chandler and Monica about this? ‘Cause y’know umm, they don’t-they don’t have any kids of their own and-and this door was like a child to them.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Treeger
utterance.content: Well I’m gonna have to put on a new lock, they’ll find out anyway.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh no.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Treeger
utterance.content: Whoa! This looks like an all day job, I’ll have to cancel my yoga class. Hey Ross!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Treeger
utterance.content: Could you tell Jasmine that I won't make it to yoga class today?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Sure.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Treeger
utterance.content: Namaste.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Namaste.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh my God! What happened to the door?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So it’s noticeable huh?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look, is Rachel here? I really need to talk to her.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Didn’t you two already talk?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah but uh… Okay, okay look you guys know that Rachel and I slept together, but there’s something else. Rachel’s pregnant.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh my God!!! I can’t believe that!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Holy mother of God!!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: With my child.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That is brand new information!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You already know don’t you?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: A little bit.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: How are you doing?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay. Okay. I mean I’ll be okay. It’s just I don’t think I handled it very well.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, what did you say to her?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Nothing. But the complaint department at the condom company got an earful. And then when I turned around she was gone.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh Ross.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: But hey, in my defense I-I just found out condoms are like only 97% effective.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I gotta go find her.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Whoa! Hey! Whoa!! Hold up! Are you serious?! So like 3% of the time they don’t even work?! Huh? They should put that on the box!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Evidently they do.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I can’t believe we’re here.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh you’ve got to be kidding me.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Front Desk Clerk
utterance.content: As a wedding gift to you, the hotel would like to give you the honeymoon suite.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No!! You have been screwing us all day!

utterance.speaker: Man
utterance.content: Who are you?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: We’re you just ten seconds later!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah! You already got the first class tickets; you got the lounge! I mean we should get free stuff too! I mean you’re not the only ones on your honeymoon!

utterance.speaker: Woman
utterance.content: Well you can have the suite if you want. We don’t care about where we stay. We’re here to celebrate our love together. We don’t have to get free stuff. We just want to be together.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: We need the stuff.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey Monica it’s Joey. Listen uh, Phoebe and I smell gas comin’ from your apartment.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What? Are you serious?! Joey smells gas!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What else is new?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah and we’d go check it out, but you took away our keys.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well do something! Get in there!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: How? I guess I could break down your door.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah! Do that!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: And-and you won’t blame us for any damage?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No! Are you doing it?! I don’t hear anything! Come on!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh, okay I’ll-I’ll-I’ll break it down.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh hey hi, he’s doing it. He’s breaking down the door. Okay, we’re in.

utterance.speaker: Nurse
utterance.content: Okay Rachel, are you comfortable?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: If I said I was, would you judge me?

utterance.speaker: Nurse
utterance.content: The doctor will be here in a minute to do your sonogram.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. Oh man, I swear if they sold these at Pottery Barn…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh we-we need to talk.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uh-uh-uh, right now? Because I’ve kinda got an el fresco situation going on over here.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Please, please I want to apologize for the way I acted earlier today.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay Ross that’s fine, but can you please stand near my head?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What? Oh yeah. I’m sorry. I mean I-I think I went a little crazy. I mean I was thinking about myself when I really—I should have been thinking about you Rach…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. Head Ross! Head Ross! Head Ross!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Right! Right! I just—I want you to know that I’m going to be there through this whole thing, okay? Okay? The doctor’s appointments, the uh, the Lamaze classes, uh baby-proofing the apartment—Although we could probably worry about that ‘til after we get married.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What married?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well yeah, I think we should get married.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What, because that’s your answer to everything?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, because that’s the right thing to do.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, maybe if you’re in love. But Ross, we are not in love, are we?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No but…but still you can’t possibly do this alone.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Excuse me?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Come on Rach, you can’t even eat alone in a restaurant.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I’m just saying if you can’t eat by yourself, how do you expect to have a baby by yourself?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I can too eat by myself!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: When have you ever?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: When certain people leave the table and I am not finished!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well certain other people take two hours to eat a bowl of soup!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh please, you inhale your food!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I grew up with Monica! If you didn’t eat fast you didn’t eat!!

utterance.speaker: Dr. Long
utterance.content: Am I interrupting?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh no Dr. Long, please come in. This is Ross, he is the father.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: But not the husband, because evidently she can do this alone.

utterance.speaker: Dr. Long
utterance.content: Huh. Nice to meet you. I’ll get started on this.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I don’t know why you can’t admit that you need me.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I do need you! I need you to stand near my head!

utterance.speaker: Dr. Long
utterance.content: Okay, everything looks good. Here it is on the screen. Here is your uterus. And right here is your baby.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh my God.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wow. There it is, I see it.

utterance.speaker: Dr. Long
utterance.content: Congratulations. I’ll give you two a minute.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Pretty amazing huh?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I don’t see it!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What? What?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I can’t see it!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You-you just said that you did!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I know, I lied! I didn’t want her to think I was a terrible mother! I can’t even see my own baby!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh sure, come here! Sure you can! Uh, look come here look, it’s-it’s-it’s, it’s right there .

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh. Oh, it’s beautiful. I see it now.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Do you really?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, I don’t see it!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Come on! Come on! Here, okay-okay, you see this? This tiny thing that looks like a peanut?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Sweetie that’s it.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That’s it? Well I saw that! Ohh-ohh-oh, thank you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You’re welcome.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wow! I can’t believe that’s our baby.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, that’s our baby.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey! So how was the doctor?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, everything went great.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Good.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh hey, show them the picture of your uterus.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don’t see the baby. Where is it?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh no, I know I couldn’t see it either at first, but it’s right umm… Ross, I lost it again.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh. (He takes the picture and hugs her.
